articles.title: Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth Statement on U.S. Africa Command Strikes in Somalia - Department of Defense
articles.description: At President Trump's direction and in coordination with the government of Somalia, Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth authorized U.S. Africa Command to conduct coordinated airstrikes targeting
articles.content:
Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth statement on U.S. Africa Command strikes in Somalia.
